descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=24][b]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN![/b][/size][/color]

This mod adds a new \"beast form\" to the game, allowing the user to transform into a Seeker from Dragonborn.

The spell tome can now be acquired in Apocrypha, during the Black Book: Waking Dreams. It is in front of the Dragon Aspect word wall. The form currently lasts for 5 minutes. This mod no longer blocks access to your inventory or spell list, this means you can equip whatever spells or powers you want. Don\'t equip weapons or armour, I don\'t know what they\'ll do to you.

[color=red]Note: You must have used Beast Form to turn into a werewolf at least once, or you won\'t be able to change back.[/color]

[b]Attacks:[/b]
Right click: Knowledge Drain
Left click: Seeker Drain
Voice power: Conjure High Seeker
author: DatedSandwich
